trans-unit.source: about_Format.ps1xml
trans-unit.target: about_Format.ps1xml

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: About Format.ps1xml
trans-unit.target: 有关 Format.ps1xml

trans-unit.source: about_Format.ps1xml
trans-unit.target: about_Format.ps1xml

trans-unit.source: about_Format.ps1xml
trans-unit.target: about_Format.ps1xml

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 简短说明

trans-unit.source: The Format.ps1xml files in Windows PowerShell define the default display of objects in the Windows PowerShell console.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 中的 Format.ps1xml 文件中定义对象的默认的显示在 Windows PowerShell 控制台中。

trans-unit.source: You can create your own Format.ps1xml files to change the display of objects or to define default displays for new object types that you create in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以创建您自己的 Format.ps1xml 文件来更改显示的对象或来定义默认值显示在 Windows PowerShell 中创建的新对象类型。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 详细说明

trans-unit.source: The Format.ps1xml files in Windows PowerShell define the default display of objects in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 中的 Format.ps1xml 文件中定义对象的默认的显示在 Windows PowerShell 中。

trans-unit.source: You can create your own Format.ps1xml files to change the display of objects or to define default displays for new object types that you create in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以创建您自己的 Format.ps1xml 文件来更改显示的对象或来定义默认值显示在 Windows PowerShell 中创建的新对象类型。

trans-unit.source: When Windows PowerShell displays an object, it uses the data in structured formatting files to determine the default display of the object.
trans-unit.target: 当 Windows PowerShell 会显示一个对象时，它使用中的数据结构化的格式设置文件以确定该对象的默认显示。

trans-unit.source: The data in the formatting files determines whether the object is rendered in a table or in a list, and it determines which properties are displayed by default.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置文件中的数据确定是否在表中或在列表中，呈现对象，并确定默认情况下显示的属性。

trans-unit.source: The formatting affects the display only.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置将影响仅显示器。

trans-unit.source: It does not affect which object properties are passed down the pipeline or how they are passed.
trans-unit.target: 它不会影响管道向下传递的对象属性，或者传递方式。

trans-unit.source: Format.ps1xml files cannot be used to customize the output format for hashtables.
trans-unit.target: Format.ps1xml 文件不能用于自定义哈希表的输出格式。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell includes seven formatting files.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 包括七个格式设置文件。

trans-unit.source: These files are located in the installation directory ($pshome).
trans-unit.target: 这些文件位于安装目录 ($pshome) 中。

trans-unit.source: Each file defines the display of a group of Microsoft .NET Framework objects:
trans-unit.target: 每个文件定义了一组 Microsoft.NET Framework 对象的显示︰

trans-unit.source: Certificate.Format.ps1xml Objects in the Certificate store, such as X.509 certificates and certificate stores.
trans-unit.target: Certificate.Format.ps1xml 的证书存储，如 X.509 证书和证书存储区中的对象。

trans-unit.source: DotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml Other .NET Framework types, such as CultureInfo, FileVersionInfo, and EventLogEntry objects.
trans-unit.target: DotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml 其他.NET Framework 类型，如 CultureInfo、 FileVersionInfo 和 EventLogEntry 对象。

trans-unit.source: FileSystem.Format.ps1xml File system objects, such as files and directories.
trans-unit.target: FileSystem.Format.ps1xml 文件系统对象，如文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: Help.Format.ps1xml Help views, such as detailed and full views, parameters, and examples.
trans-unit.target: Help.Format.ps1xml 帮助的视图，如详细视图和完整视图、 参数和示例。

trans-unit.source: PowerShellCore.format.ps1xml Objects generated by Windows PowerShell core cmdlets, such as Get-Member and Get-History.
trans-unit.target: PowerShellCore.format.ps1xml 由 Windows PowerShell 核心 cmdlet，如 Get-member 和获取历史记录生成的对象。

trans-unit.source: PowerShellTrace.format.ps1xml Trace objects, such as those generated by the Trace-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: PowerShellTrace.format.ps1xml 跟踪对象，如那些由 Trace-command cmdlet 生成。

trans-unit.source: Registry.format.ps1xml Registry objects, such as keys and entries.
trans-unit.target: Registry.format.ps1xml 注册表对象，如项和条目。

trans-unit.source: A formatting file can define four different views of each object: table, list, wide, and custom.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置文件可以定义四种不同视图的每个对象︰ 表、 列表、 范围的和自定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, when the output of a Get-ChildItem command is piped to a Format-List command, Format-List uses the view in the FileSystem.format.ps1xml file to determine how to display the file and folder objects as a list.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当 Get-childitem 命令的输出通过管道传递给 Format-list 命令，Format-list 使用视图 FileSystem.format.ps1xml 文件中来确定如何以列表形式显示文件和文件夹对象。

trans-unit.source: When a formatting file includes more than one view of an object, Windows PowerShell applies the first view that it finds.
trans-unit.target: 当格式设置文件包含多个对象的视图时，Windows PowerShell 将应用它找到的第一个视图。

trans-unit.source: In a Format.ps1xml file, a view is defined by a set of XML tags that describe the name of the view, the type of object to which it can be applied, the column headers, and the properties that are displayed in the body of the view.
trans-unit.target: 在 Format.ps1xml 文件中，视图由一组定义的 XML 标记描述视图的对象的类型的名称，它可以应用，列标题，并显示在视图的正文的属性。

trans-unit.source: The format in Format.ps1xml files is applied just before the data is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 数据呈现给用户之前应用 Format.ps1xml 文件中的格式。

trans-unit.source: Creating New Format.ps1xml Files
trans-unit.target: 创建新的 Format.ps1xml 文件

trans-unit.source: The .ps1xml files that are installed with Windows PowerShell are digitally signed to prevent tampering because the formatting can include script blocks.
trans-unit.target: 随 Windows PowerShell 一起安装的.ps1xml 文件进行数字签名以防止篡改由于格式可以包括脚本块。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to change the display format of an existing object view, or to add views for new objects, create your own Format.ps1xml files, and then add them to your Windows PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: 因此，若要更改现有的对象视图的显示格式或添加新对象的视图，创建您自己的 Format.ps1xml 文件，并将它们添加到 Windows PowerShell 会话。

trans-unit.source: To create a new file, copy an existing Format.ps1xml file.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新文件时，复制现有的 Format.ps1xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The new file can have any name, but it must have a .ps1xml file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 新的文件可以有任何名称，但是它必须具有.ps1xml 文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: You can place the new file in any directory that is accessible to Windows PowerShell, but it is useful to place the files in the Windows PowerShell installation directory ($pshome) or in a subdirectory of the installation directory.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将新的文件放置在任何目录都可以访问 Windows PowerShell 中，但有必要将文件放在 Windows PowerShell 安装目录 ($pshome) 或安装目录的子目录中。

trans-unit.source: To change the formatting of a current view, locate the view in the formatting file, and then use the tags to change the view.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改当前视图的格式，在格式设置文件中，找到视图，然后使用标记更改视图。

trans-unit.source: To create a view for a new object type, create a new view, or use an existing view as a model.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建新的对象类型的视图，创建新的视图，或作为模型使用现有视图。

trans-unit.source: (The tags are described in the next section of this topic.) You can then delete all the other views in the file so that the changes are obvious to anyone examining the file.
trans-unit.target: （本主题的下一节描述了标记）。然后可以删除该文件中的所有其他视图，以便所做的更改并检查文件的任何人都明显。

trans-unit.source: When you have saved the changes, use the Update-FormatData cmdlet to add the new file to your Windows PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: 保存所做的更改时，请使用 Update-formatdata cmdlet 将新文件添加到你的 Windows PowerShell 会话。

trans-unit.source: If you want your view to take precedence over a view defined in the built-in files, use the PrependData parameter of Update-FormatData.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想让视图优先于内置文件中定义的视图，使用 Update-formatdata 的 PrependData 参数。

trans-unit.source: Update-FormatData affects only the current session.
trans-unit.target: Update-formatdata 仅影响当前会话。

trans-unit.source: To make the change to all future sessions, add the Update-FormatData command to your Windows PowerShell profile.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改所有将来的会话，将 Update-formatdata 命令添加到 Windows PowerShell 配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Example: Adding Calendar Data to Culture Objects
trans-unit.target: 示例︰ 将日历数据添加到的区域性对象

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to change the formatting of the culture objects (System.Globalization.CultureInfo) generated by the Get-Culture cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何更改与 Get-culture cmdlet 生成的区域性对象 (System.Globalization.CultureInfo) 的格式设置。

trans-unit.source: The commands in the example add the calendar property to the default table view display of culture objects.
trans-unit.target: 示例中的命令添加到默认表视图显示区域性对象的 calendar 属性。

trans-unit.source: The first step is to find the Format.ps1xml file that contains the current view of the culture objects.
trans-unit.target: 第一步是查找包含区域性对象的当前视图的 Format.ps1xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following Select-String command finds the file:
trans-unit.target: 下面的 Select-string 命令查找该文件︰

trans-unit.source: select-string -path $pshome\*format.ps1xml ` -pattern System.Globalization.CultureInfo
trans-unit.target: 选择-字符串-路径 $pshome\*format.ps1xml '-模式 System.Globalization.CultureInfo

trans-unit.source: This command reveals that the definition is in the DotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml file.
trans-unit.target: 此命令会发现该定义是在 DotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml 文件中。

trans-unit.source: The next command copies the file contents to a new file, MyDotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml.
trans-unit.target: 下一个命令将该文件的内容复制到新文件，MyDotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml。

trans-unit.source: copy-item DotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml MyDotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml
trans-unit.target: 复制项 DotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml MyDotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml

trans-unit.source: Next, open the MyDotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml file in any XML or text editor, such as Notepad.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，在任何 XML 或文本编辑器 （如记事本） 中打开 MyDotNetTypes.Format.ps1xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: Find the System.Globalization.CultureInfo object section.
trans-unit.target: 找到 System.Globalization.CultureInfo 对象部分。

trans-unit.source: The following XML defines the views of the CultureInfo object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 XML 定义 CultureInfo 对象的视图。

trans-unit.source: The object has only a TableControl view.
trans-unit.target: 该对象具有仅 TableControl 视图。

trans-unit.source: System.Globalization.CultureInfo</Name> <ViewSelectedBy> <TypeName>Deserialized.System.Globalization.CultureInfo</TypeName> <TypeName>System.Globalization.CultureInfo
trans-unit.target: System.Globalization.CultureInfo</Name> <ViewSelectedBy> <TypeName>Deserialized.System.Globalization.CultureInfo</TypeName> <TypeName>System.Globalization.CultureInfo

trans-unit.source: 16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader> <Width>16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader/> </TableHeaders> <TableRowEntries> <TableRowEntry> <TableColumnItems> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>LCID</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>Name</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>DisplayName
trans-unit.target: 16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader> <Width>16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader/> </TableHeaders> <TableRowEntries> <TableRowEntry> <TableColumnItems> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>LCID</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>名称</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>DisplayName

trans-unit.source: Delete the remainder of the file, except for the opening <?XML>, <Configuration>, and <ViewDefinitions> tags and the closing <ViewDefintions> and <Configuration> tags.
trans-unit.target: 删除文件，除了在左括号的其余部分 <？XML >， <Configuration>, ，和 <ViewDefinitions> 标记和结束 <ViewDefintions> 和 <Configuration> 标记。

trans-unit.source: You must also delete the digital signature whenever you change the file.
trans-unit.target: 每当您更改该文件时，还必须删除数字签名。

trans-unit.source:
System.Globalization.CultureInfo</Name> <ViewSelectedBy> <TypeName>Deserialized.System.Globalization.CultureInfo</TypeName> <TypeName>System.Globalization.CultureInfo</TypeName> </ViewSelectedBy>
<TableControl> <TableHeaders> <TableColumnHeader> <Width>16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader> <Width>16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader/> </TableHeaders> <TableRowEntries> <TableRowEntry> <TableColumnItems> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>LCID</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>Name</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>DisplayName
trans-unit.target:
System.Globalization.CultureInfo</Name> <ViewSelectedBy> <TypeName>Deserialized.System.Globalization.CultureInfo</TypeName> <TypeName>System.Globalization.CultureInfo</TypeName> </ViewSelectedBy>
<TableControl> <TableHeaders> <TableColumnHeader> <Width>16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader> <Width>16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader/> </TableHeaders> <TableRowEntries> <TableRowEntry> <TableColumnItems> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>LCID</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>名称</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>DisplayName

trans-unit.source: Next, create a new column for the Calendar property by adding a new set of <TableColumnHeader> tags.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，为创建一个新列的 Calendar 属性通过添加一组新的 <TableColumnHeader> 标记。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Calendar property can be long, so a value of 45 characters is used, as follows:
trans-unit.target: Calendar 属性的值可以是长，因此，使用值为 45 个字符，，如下所示︰

trans-unit.source: 16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader> <Width>16
trans-unit.target: 16</Width> </TableColumnHeader> <TableColumnHeader> <Width>16

trans-unit.source: Now, add a new column item in the table rows, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 现在，按以下方式在表行中，添加一个新的列项︰

trans-unit.source: LCID</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>Name
trans-unit.target: LCID</PropertyName> </TableColumnItem> <TableColumnItem> <PropertyName>名称

trans-unit.source: Calendar
trans-unit.target: 日历

trans-unit.source: DisplayName
trans-unit.target: DisplayName

trans-unit.source: After saving the file and closing it, use an Update-FormatData command, such as the following command, to add the new format file to the current session.
trans-unit.target: 保存文件并关闭它后, 使用 Update-formatdata 命令，如下面的命令，将新格式的文件添加到当前会话。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the PrependData parameter to place the new file in a higher precedence order than the original file.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 PrependData 参数将新文件放置在具有较高的优先级比原始文件中。

trans-unit.source: (For more information about Update-FormatData, type "get-help update-formatdata".)
trans-unit.target: （有关 Update-formatdata 的详细信息，键入"get-help 更新 formatdata"。）

trans-unit.source: update-formatdata -prependpath $pshome\MyDotNetTypes.format.ps1xml
trans-unit.target: 更新 formatdata-prependpath $pshome\MyDotNetTypes.format.ps1xml

trans-unit.source: To test the change, type "get-culture", and then review the output, which includes the Calendar property.
trans-unit.target: 要测试更改，请键入"get-区域性"，然后查看输出，其中包括的 Calendar 属性。

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> get-culture
trans-unit.target: C:\PS > 获取区域性

trans-unit.source: LCID Name Calendar DisplayName
trans-unit.target: LCID 名称日历显示名称

trans-unit.source: 1033 en-US System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar English (United States)
trans-unit.target: 1033 EN-US System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar 英语 （美国）

trans-unit.source: The XML in Format.ps1xml Files
trans-unit.target: Format.ps1xml 文件中的 XML

trans-unit.source: The ViewDefinitions section of each Format.ps1xml file contains the <View> tags that define each view.
trans-unit.target: 每个 Format.ps1xml 文件的 ViewDefinitions 部分包含 <View> 定义每个视图的标记。

trans-unit.source: A typical <View> tag includes the following tags:
trans-unit.target: 典型 <View> 标记包含下列标记︰

trans-unit.source: The <Name> tag identifies the name of the view.
trans-unit.target: <Name> 标记标识的视图的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <ViewSelectedBy> tag specifies the object type or types to which the view applies.
trans-unit.target: <ViewSelectedBy> 标记指定的对象类型或类型的视图取决于。

trans-unit.source: The <GroupBy> tag specifies how items in the view will be combined in groups.
trans-unit.target: <GroupBy> 标记指定将如何在组中组合视图中的项。

trans-unit.source: These tags contain the tags that specify how each item will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 这些标记包含指定的每一项的显示方式的标记。

trans-unit.source: The <ViewSelectedBy> tag can contain a <TypeName> tag for each object type to which the view applies.
trans-unit.target: <ViewSelectedBy> 标记可以包含 <TypeName> 的视图取决于每个对象类型的标记。

trans-unit.source: Or, it can contain a <SelectionSetName> tag that references a selection set that is defined elsewhere by using a <SelectionSet> tag.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以包含 <SelectionSetName> 标记引用的选项集，它是通过使用在其他位置定义 <SelectionSet> 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <GroupBy> tag contains a <PropertyName> tag that specifies the object property by which items are to be grouped.
trans-unit.target: <GroupBy> 标记包含 <PropertyName> 指定项的分组所依据的对象属性的标记。

trans-unit.source: It also contains either a <Label> tag that specifies a string to be used as a label for each group or a <CustomControlName> tag that references a custom control defined elsewhere using a <Control> tag.
trans-unit.target: 它还包含 <Label> 指定要用作每个组的标签的字符串的标记或 <CustomControlName> 引用在其他地方使用定义的自定义控件的标记 <Control> 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <Control> tag contains a <Name> tag and a <CustomControl> tag.
trans-unit.target: <Control> 标记包含 <Name> 标记和一个 <CustomControl> 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <TableControl> tag typically contains <TableHeaders> and <TableRowEntries> tags that define the formatting for the table's heads and rows.
trans-unit.target: <TableControl> 标记通常包含 <TableHeaders> 和 <TableRowEntries> 定义为表的标题和行的格式设置的标记。

trans-unit.source: The <TableHeaders> tag typically contains <TableColumnHeader> tags that contain <Label>, <Width>, and <Alignment> tags.
trans-unit.target: <TableHeaders> 标记通常包含 <TableColumnHeader> 包含标签 <Label>, ，<Width>, ，和 <Alignment> 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <TableRowEntries> tag contains <TableRowEntry> tags for each row in the table.
trans-unit.target: <TableRowEntries> 标记包含 <TableRowEntry> 表中的每一行的标记。

trans-unit.source: The <TableRowEntry> tag contains a <TableColumnItems> tag that contains a <TableColumnItem> tag for each column in the row.
trans-unit.target: <TableRowEntry> 标记包含 <TableColumnItems> 包含标记 <TableColumnItem> 行中的每个列的标记。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <TableColumnItem> tag contains either a <PropertyName> tag that identifies the object property to be displayed in the defined location, or a <ScriptBlock> tag that contains script code that calculates a result that is to be displayed in the location.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下， <TableColumnItem> 标记包含 <PropertyName> 标记用于标识要显示在所定义的位置，该对象属性或 <ScriptBlock> 包含计算得出的位置中显示的结果的脚本代码的标记。

trans-unit.source: Note: Script blocks can also be used elsewhere in locations where calculated results can be useful.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 脚本块还可在其他地方，计算的结果可能非常有用的位置中。

trans-unit.source: The <TableColumnItem> tag can also contain a <FormatString> tag that specifies how the property or the calculated results will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <TableColumnItem> 标记还可以包含 <FormatString> 标记，它指定如何显示的属性或计算的结果。

trans-unit.source: The <ListControl> tag typically contains a <ListEntries> tag.
trans-unit.target: <ListControl> 标记通常包含 <ListEntries> 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <ListEntries> tag contains a <ListItems> tag.
trans-unit.target: <ListEntries> 标记包含 <ListItems> 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <ListItems> tag contains <ListItem> tags, which contain <PropertyName> tags.
trans-unit.target: <ListItems> 标记包含 <ListItem> 标记，其中包含 <PropertyName> 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <PropertyName> tags specify the object property to be displayed at the specified location in the list.
trans-unit.target: <PropertyName> 标记指定要显示在列表中的指定位置处的对象属性。

trans-unit.source: If the view selection is defined using a selection set, the <ListControl> tag can also contain an <EntrySelectedBy> tag that contains one or more <TypeName> tags.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用选集，定义的视图选择 <ListControl> 标记还可以包含 <EntrySelectedBy> 包含一个或多个标记 <TypeName> 标记。

trans-unit.source: These <TypeName> tags specify the object type that the <ListControl> tag is intended to display.
trans-unit.target: 这些 <TypeName> 标记指定的对象类型 <ListControl> 标记用于显示。

trans-unit.source: The <WideControl> tag typically contains a <WideEntries> tag.
trans-unit.target: <WideControl> 标记通常包含 <WideEntries> 标记。

trans-unit.source: The <WideEntries> tag contains one or more <WideEntry> tags.
trans-unit.target: <WideEntries> 标记均包含一个或多个 <WideEntry> 标记。

trans-unit.source: A <WideEntry> tag typically contains a <PropertyName> tag that specifies the property to be displayed at the specified location in the view.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <WideEntry> 标记通常包含 <PropertyName> 指定的属性显示在视图中的指定位置处的标记。

trans-unit.source: The <PropertyName> tag can contain a <FormatString> tag that specifies how the property is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <PropertyName> 标记可以包含 <FormatString> 指定该属性的显示方式的标记。

trans-unit.source: The <CustomControl> tag lets you use a script block to define a format.
trans-unit.target: <CustomControl> 标记使您可以使用脚本块定义的格式。

trans-unit.source: A <CustomControl> tag typically contains a <CustomEntries> tag that contains multiple <CustomEntry> tags.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <CustomControl> 标记通常包含 <CustomEntries> 包含多个标记 <CustomEntry> 标记。

trans-unit.source: Each <CustomEntry> tag contains a <CustomItem> tags that can contain a variety of tags that specify contents and formatting of the specified location in the view, including <Text>, <Indentation>, <ExpressionBinding>, and <NewLine> tags.
trans-unit.target: 每个 <CustomEntry> 标记包含 <CustomItem> 标记，可以包含各种指定内容的标记和在视图中，指定的位置的格式设置包括 <Text>, ，<Indentation>, ，<ExpressionBinding>, ，和 <NewLine> 标记。

trans-unit.source: Update-FormatData
trans-unit.target: Update-FormatData

trans-unit.source: To load your Format.ps1xml files into a Windows PowerShell session, use the Update-FormatData cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要将您的 Format.ps1xml 文件加载到 Windows PowerShell 会话，请使用 Update-formatdata cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: If you want the views in your file to take precedence over the views in the built-in Format.ps1xml file, use the PrependData parameter of Update-FormatData.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望您的文件以优先于内置的 Format.ps1xml 文件中的视图中的视图，使用 Update-formatdata 的 PrependData 参数。

trans-unit.source: Update-FormatData affects only the current session.
trans-unit.target: Update-formatdata 仅影响当前会话。

trans-unit.source: To make the change to all future sessions, add the Update-FormatData command to your Windows PowerShell profile.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改所有将来的会话，将 Update-formatdata 命令添加到 Windows PowerShell 配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Default Displays in Types.ps1xml
trans-unit.target: 在 Types.ps1xml 中默认显示

trans-unit.source: The default displays of some basic object types are defined in the Types.ps1xml file in the $pshome directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认值显示的某些基本类型 $pshome 目录中的 Types.ps1xml 文件中定义的对象。

trans-unit.source: The nodes are named PsStandardMembers, and the subnodes use one of the following tags:
trans-unit.target: 节点进行命名 PsStandardMembers，且子节点使用以下标记之一︰

trans-unit.source: For more information, type the following command:
trans-unit.target: 详细信息，请键入以下命令︰

trans-unit.source: get-help about_types.ps1xml
trans-unit.target: 获取帮助 about_types.ps1xml

trans-unit.source: Tracing Format.ps1xml File Use
trans-unit.target: 跟踪 Format.ps1xml 文件中使用

trans-unit.source: To detect errors in the loading or application of Format.ps1xml files, use the Trace-Command cmdlet with any of the following format components as the value of the Name parameter:
trans-unit.target: 若要在加载或应用程序的 Format.ps1xml 文件中检测错误，请使用 Trace-command cmdlet 带有任何以下格式组件作为 Name 参数的值︰

trans-unit.source: FormatFileLoading UpdateFormatData FormatViewBinding
trans-unit.target: FormatFileLoading UpdateFormatData FormatViewBinding

trans-unit.source: For more information, type the following commands:
trans-unit.target: 详细信息，请键入以下命令︰

trans-unit.source: get-help trace-command get-help get-tracesource
trans-unit.target: 获取帮助跟踪命令 get-help get tracesource

trans-unit.source: Signing a Format.ps1xml File
trans-unit.target: 对 Format.ps1xml 文件进行签名

trans-unit.source: To protect the users of your Format.ps1xml file, sign the file using a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 若要保护的 Format.ps1xml 文件的用户，请使用数字签名对文件进行签名。

trans-unit.source: For more information, type:
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请键入：

trans-unit.source: get-help about_signing
trans-unit.target: get-help about_signing

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: Update-FormatData Trace-Command Get-TraceSource
trans-unit.target: Update-formatdata 跟踪-命令 Get-tracesource
